text: The Pythagorean Theorem is a fundamental concept in geometry that holds immense significance, and has far-reaching implications in various areas of mathematics and physics. This theorem, that states "a² + b² = c²" for right-angled triangles has enabled scientists to calculate distances and lengths with remarkable accuracy.
